title: New: Death Grips – Lost Boy
body:
So now we know that we’re getting not one, but two albums from **Death Grips** this year, anticipation is building faster than ever.

Earlier this evening the vomit-hop group dropped new track _Lost Boy_ via their Facebook, and it’s an aggressive, psychotic number, with the monstrous beat twisting viciously throughout, with yelped cries of ‘lost boy lost boy lost boy’ echoing over the top. Check out _Lost Boy_ below, taken from _**The Money Store**_ out April 24 on Epic Records.
